section.section: A Class B license shall be issued by the license issuing authority of the county in which the place of business is located. The holder of the license may keep for sale and sell beer at retail at any hotel or restaurant at the place described in the license for consumption on the premises or elsewhere.
The annual fee for the license shall be paid to the local collecting agent before any license is issued, for distribution as provided.
